properties.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 24 at 5:51AM EST until January 24 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Tide levels are expected to briefly reach 7.0 feet Mean
Lower Low Water in the Charleston Harbor with high tide this
morning.

* WHERE...Charleston County.

* WHEN...Until 8 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Minor flooding on some roadways in Downtown
Charleston, including portions of Fishburne Street and Hagood
Avenue adjacent to Gadsden Creek.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide will occur around 7:38 AM today
at Charleston.
properties.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

NWSheadline: A BRIEF PERIOD OF MINOR TIDAL FLOODING POSSIBLE THIS MORNING
